data.prayer: Spirit, give the believers of the the county of Dera Ismail Khan unity and humility as they work to bring the kingdom to new people and places.

data.location_label: Photo from the county of Dera Ismail Khan, N.W.F.P., Pakistan
data.section_summary: What people or resources could you pray for in this photo?

data.prayer: Father, please give the people in the county of Dera Ismail Khan access to a Bible in their own language.

data.section_summary: On average, 17 people will die without Jesus in the next 100 hours in Dera Ismail Khan, N.W.F.P., Pakistan.
data.prayer: Father, send your gospel to these.
Good Shepherd, thank you that you know the name of each of the 606 believers in Dera Ismail Khan.
data.verse: I am the good shepherd; I know my sheep and my sheep know me

data.prayer: Father, please, raise up a generation of disciples in the county of Dera Ismail Khan who will make disciples who make disciples.

Lord God, I thank you that the blood of Christ, who through the eternal Spirit offered himself without defect to God, can cleanse the Baloch Palafi people conscience from dead works to serve the living God.
Jesus, please help the 606 believers in the county of Dera Ismail Khan to be filled with joyful obedience at all times, as you modeled for us all.
Father, you desire the people in the county of Dera Ismail Khan who are far from you to hear about you.
data.verse: "Those who were not told about him will see, and those who have not heard will understand."

data.section_summary:
the county of Dera Ismail Khan, N.W.F.P., Pakistan has a population of 217,500.

We estimate Dera Ismail Khan has 606 people who might know Jesus, 2,175 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 214,719 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 358 neighbors who need Jesus.

data.prayer: Spirit, encourage the disciples in Dera Ismail Khan, N.W.F.P., Pakistan to live with urgency and a passion for making more disciples.
data.verse: Yet you do not know what your life will be like tomorrow. you are just a vapor that appears for a little while and then vanishes away.
